content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with two friends in east tacoma wa. midnight emptyienjoying bonfire when one friend notices a red orb hovering about 1-200 ft away to the east. it slowly started moving south about 5mph for 1 or 2 minutes then stopped, went up a few ft then faded and blinked out, didn't go anywhere just faded out.
content.summary: Red orb hovering then slowly moving south then fading and blinking out

content.detailedDescription:
The event started as i was sat on the back step of my garden, having just finished a cup of coffee i was waiting for one of my friends to arrive before i began my workout at the makeshift gym that's inside my garage.

my friend was running late so i sat enjoying the sun and carried on gazing into the sky as i often do, i then received a message from my friend saying "i��� am almost at yours now, just seen those strange orbs again".

at this point i decided to stand up and move into the center of the garden as my view to the west was obscured by the conservatory and the view to my east was blocked slightly by the garage.

i��� am well accustom to seeing planes flying through the sky at all times of the day including military, commercial and civilian flights all at varying altitude and flight paths, however after looking around for a couple of minutes i did notice something odd.

what i saw was a small circular object coming from the north east, it was moving at a steady speed travelling south in the distance. i was and still am for that matter unsure of whether this was simply a sort of optical illusion or reflection from a commercial airliner due to the sunlight.

i attempted to video this object a couple of times however it would not appear on the screen. in response i decided to take some pictures instead hoping for better results and i managed to snap a few pictures. (18:16-18:17)

this object carried on south and approximately 6 minutes later the second larger orb came into view travelling the same sort of flight path, this object was noticeably larger than the last and i wanted to try and identify it.

in order to get a better look i ran inside and grabbed an old monocular (used to be binoculars but it broke) using this i got a much better view of the object which had now picked up speed slightly. 

the object itself was quite odd, i had seen quite a few planes flying over as i was sitting outside earlier and they all have some distinguishing features regardless of their distance, whether it be the things like the general shape of a known aircraft or simply seeing contrails, it is generally not too difficult to identify an airliner.

however this object seemed to lack a rigid outline that i could identify. as i was watching it move i was also recording with my phone which struggled to focus on the object itself, oddly enough i also found it difficult to focus on the object using the monocular, its appearance was fuzzy at best and to make matters worse my phone abruptly halted its recording after about 30 seconds informing me that the memory was too low to continue.

i did as mentioned get about 30 seconds of footage although only a couple of frames are actually in focus on the object, i also made sure to look down during the recording so the garage roof can be seen in order to give some sort of perspective of distance and possibly size and speed.

3 minutes after the second craft had passed by (18:25) i saw a third craft moving across the same flight path again, this object was flatter more streamlined and as such looked to be closer to what is recognizable as an aircraft.

during this period i was calm and was simply trying my best to get some decent footage or at least identify the object myself, i lost sight of the objects as they maintained their courses south.
content.summary: Unidentified crafts fly by uk 2014

content.detailedDescription:
In my back deck,in milan mi. with my 39 year old granson drinking beer and watching planes going and coming from dtw. looked south seen 2 big light orange lights coming from the south. we both seen them ,thought they where helicopters ,but no sound flew over my house southwest side ,when they crossed my house we saw 2 discs ,no light but dark from the sky ,they flew north towards brighton,they looked like they were floating like a boat in the water we could see the bottom and then the top. we watched till they disappeared into the horizon,
they looked dark in the dusk sky, but no lights in back,only seen the lights in front when they were coming toward us.
from the distance we observed them and the distance between milan and brighton mi. i estimate they were traveling at least 900 miles an hour
there were planes going east and west from dtw
we were flabbergasted ,i am 80 years old and never in my life had i see a ufo only in news or books ,movies
now i truly believe most of ufo sighting are true
tried to take pics with phone but no luck i was stuned at first never thought of pics until it was to late
content.summary: Disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription: This is amazine that according to the direction of the pilot i switched off my mobile but suddenly something happend to me and i felt to make video so i switched on the mobile and hidenly i started to record so suddenly i seen this light.
content.summary: I seen this lights when i was traveling in a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 18 in morning i went to a under construction building in my area.
from the top of the building the view was very good so i thought of capturing photos i captured a pic.When i zoomed the pic to check the camera quality , i noticed a object in pic , it was in sky. i clicked the pic at a height of 6 floors the object was very high for me.


to see the ufo zoom the pic and then search for it in the sky part of pic.You will see it.
content.summary: Noticed the ufo while capturing a pic

content.detailedDescription: Me & my cousin were enjoying a summer day & decided to play a game of paintball in the woods. it was a small stand of timber maybe 20 acres in size w/a small wet weather creek that ran through the middle of said timber. there was also an old deer hunting stand built on the ground on the north end of property that we used like "capture the fort", during our game. we also assigned 1 side of the property like this side of the creek is your territory & that side is yours. to be honest; at that time "paint-ball", guns were so expensive that we used our old daisy bb guns (that shot @ speeds of 300fps max), & scrounged up some safety gear and/or made it ourselves. earlier in the week i had hit my head upon the duct work on the ceiling of my cousin's house causing a small cut. i usually wore a ball cap outdoors but hadn't due to the cut upon my head being tender to touch. my cousin however wore his hat that was black w/gold stitching on the brim & front of the cap he had gotten from the nra. it stuck out like a sore thumb in the woods when i had spotted him later on once we had begun our game of "paint-ball".  i was on the east side of the timber & my cousin was on the west side.  as we had often done before one would give the other 2-minutes to hide before the other would enter the woods thereby starting the game.  if you were not shot or you did not shoot your opponent but could capture the fort & hold the fort for 15minutes you would win the game. most times one or the other would strike a hit ending the game as we had only 1-hour to complete the game or win. as luck would have it (rock, paper & scissors) best 2 out of 3 i would have the 1st advantage of hiding plus a 2 minute head start so i may strike the first shot. i remember clearly hiding in a ditch and covering myself with leaves & watching my cousin walk past me on his way to his side of the woods. however because he was so close he would hear me if i made my move to shoot him, so i had to wait. by that time he was out of range forcing me to engage him across the creek. we were not allowed to cross into one anothers territory until one had entered the neutral ground of the fort thereby capturing it giving the other 15minutes to try to win with scoring a direct hit. i got up & began to slowly work my way through the woods the way my cousin had walked when he had passed me covered by leaves. i remember seeing the black hat w/gold stitching and using it for a point of aim as the bb would fall to the chest due to it's lack of power and no head shot's were allowed. he was in thick brush & i never could get a clean shot at him but remember every time i moved for a better shot he moved for better cover. i would relocate him w/that hat & it's bright gold stitching.  he began working his way north toward the fort & i remember really trying to score a hit but i had begun to have trouble seeing him as he had removed the hat giving him more camouflage. well i didn't score a hit & he took the fort & held it for the 15-minutes without me scoring a hit thereby giving him the win & me the loss. as we called the game to an end for a safety measure to ensure that one or the other would not shoot accidentally; i waited for him to walk back through the woods slightly uphill to catch my breath as it was a hot missouri day, back to me where we usually discussed the game, our tactics and close shots. as we stopped at the clearing overlooking the field & his home we stopped yet again to rest & take a drink of water. i remember wiping my forehead from the sweat and i removed the hat from my head. at 1st i didn't realize i wasn't wearing the hat at the start of the game. my cousin had it on, not me. i asked him what happened to his hat as i had assumed by this time that i simply forgot i was wearing one. he paused with a puzzled look & said "man, i don't know where my hat is at?" we walked back to the fort, not there, retraced our steps best we could and still no hat. as we began discussing what could have happened i told him that i was using the hat to aim at him & to find him when he changed positions. he stated that while he occupied the fort he could see the gold stitched logo & laurels on the brim of the hat on my head & he too was using it to locate me & to aim at for a "holdover" shot as the bb rifles were weak. i told him i wasn't wearing a hat then & didn't enter the woods with a hat on due to my cut on the head. he then remembers, "oh yeah, i forgot about your head being cut & you didn't want a hat to wear before we left". i responded "yeah, i've not worn a hat all week. you were the one wearing the hat today, not me remember?" he remembered & agreed w/me. we tried to think if we had come in contact with one another during the game, but we had not. we both agreed that he was the only one with a hat that day & that i had not worn one at all. after all there was only the one (1) hat between us both. we both entertained the idea that maybe we simply forgot & he had handed that hat to me & i simply put it on without thinking. but we remembered we hadn't ever came in contact with one another. well after thinking of all the possible ways we could have switched the hat from him to me we came up with this scenario. he was wearing the hat when we entered the woods & he had it on when i was in pursuit of him from across the creek, then when he had captured the fort i was then wearing the same hat as he was certain that during the game he too used it for finding me & aiming at me to win the game. then from the time he made his way to capture the fort, we both experienced a simultaneous moment or longer "memory lapse", wherein we switched the hat from him to me. thereby experiencing a so-called "memory lapse" or a "double-blackout", but we both realized the odds of such an event occurring to 2-people at the exact same time would be astronomical, but it was the only plausible explanation possible. however for these last 25 years i have thought often of that sunny summer day in the woods & wondered how me & my cousin could have both suffered a simultaneous "blank spot", in our memories. every time i've passed by that old house and those woods i feel "uneasy", or kind of strange, but dismiss it as nothing. we had talked a couple of times about that day and "other" possibilities that it could have been. he suggested once that it may have been a case of being both abducted by aliens. i quickly rejected that idea & he stated too that he was just trying to think of anything that it could have been instead of the "memory lapse", we had chalked it up to. as we grew older we never spoke of that day again. however as i've became more interested in t.V. shows that talk about the paranormal, aliens, bigfoot, etc., and those subjects have been given more credence, more information, & the birth of the internet allowing for the sharing of knowledge & information; i began to re-examine that day long ago. it's worried me for the past couple years as my knowledge and hearing of 1st hand accounts from others that have come forward that maybe, just maybe there was something more that happened that day than just the switching of a hat. i'm not saying it's "aliens", "little grey men", "little green men", whatever you want to call it. it's just that it's became the more possible outcome that what happened 25 years ago was something more than a "memory lapse". i would never go on t.V. & discuss this day or radio as this is a rural community & i've became a business owner, a father of 3 sons, upstanding member of the community. i wouldn't want friends & neighbors thinking i'm some ufo, roswell, area 51 conspiracy type guy. it's just the more i hear of normal people just like me that have had similar type things happen to them or worse & they are willing to come forward, and so many people are having these experiences i do believe there is something out there that i can't explain away with a "memory lapse". i would be willing to take a "lie detector", test of my account of what happened that day. i do not nor have i ever suffered from any mental disabilities. i'd undergo a physical to prove my health and/or mental status, but never would i go public about what little happened that day. it's just a hat that switched who was wearing it. my story isn't much & it's not exciting but i just wanted to tell someone that knows more about this type stuff than i do so i know i'm not crazy.  thank you for your time!
content.summary: Me & a friend playing paintball come out of woods wearing different clothing w/no memory of switching

content.detailedDescription: I have not considered this event to be a ufo necessarily, but i thought the event may be worth sharing in case anyone else may have witnessed something similar. the event happened in the cherry grove section of north myrtle beach, sc. i can't say for certain what the date was, but it was warm enought that we were grilling on the back porch off the second story of the house. not sure about the time either but it was dark, definitely after sunset. the event began as i walked out of the sliding glass door while carrying a tray of steaks to put on the grill. it took both hands to carry the tray and i shut the door once i was outside by facing it and using my elbow. after shutting the door i turned around, still holding the tray of steaks and clearly saw lights approximately three to four feet away from me. they were just below eye level, i am 6 ft tall. the formation consisted of nine rectangles approximately 2 inches in length. the overall shape of the lights was a triangle, each point of the triangle was a group of three rectangles. the distance between the points of the triangle was less than 1 foot. the points of the triangle were, again, comprised of three rectangles, one red, one yellow and one greenish blue and they were grouped together one on top of the other, oriented horizontally and not touching each other, a slight gap between them. so i am standing there with a pan full of steaks trying to understand what i am looking at for about 2-3 seconds, then the formation of lights begins to move as a unit to the left about a foot in distance, then to the right about a foot or so and then back to the left. this movement took about an additional 3 seconds. then they just disappeared, as if they had been turned off. i immediately turned around, elbowed open the sliding glass door and asked my dad and stepmom who were just inside the door in the kitchen if they had seen what i had just seen. of course, they had no idea what i had seen and didn't see anything so i tried to explain it to them. i was moved and insistent and sincere and dumbfounded and i couldn't explain it in a way they didn't immediately dismiss. it was frustrating. i have no idea what it was or what it may be. i can only tell you it was the strangest occurrence of my life. again, i realize this isn't a "ufo" technically, but maybe someone else has reported something similar. hope it may be helpful.
content.summary: Observed formation of rectangular lights from a distance of 6 feet that moved back and forth then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My grandparents lived in dayton, ohio for years prior to 1964. a close friend retired from wright patterson afb. he was high ranking. my grandmother, who was the most witty, honest, and candid persons i'dve ever met asked him if it were true about the alien craft and possibly the alien bodies being store at the base. i'll never forget her telling me this story and her words regarding his response. he said "(my grandmother's name), if the public knew what was at the base from the roswell incident, there would be a general panic amongst the public. she asked him nothing else and he made no more mention of it.
content.summary: A story told to me by my grandmother while living in dayton, ohio with a newly retired high ranking officer from wright patterson air force base. my grandmother is one of the most honest and  rational people you'd ever meet. i have no reason to doubt the

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house on lake lanier on july 4th 2014 watching a firework show across the lake from the shoreline of my friends house. 30 to 45 minutes after the show ended my friends and i noticed a bright red ball or at first what we thought might be mars in the ne sky above the treeline, but we agreed it was to large or dominant in the sky and appeared to be only a few miles away. we continued to look at it and see it clearly due to the fact that the skies were perfectly clear that night. the bright red ball was completely stationary for 20 to 25 minutes over the treeline when suddenly it ascended at a high rate of speed very high in the sky toward our direction and stopped and started hovering. there was no sound made from this object and by now the lake was very quite and peaceful! we continued to watch it hover way above us, then suddenly it disappeared,i mean completely vanished before our eyes. we were all astonished! this was my 1st ufo sighting and it was for my friends as well. i am a firm believer in ufo's and i know what we saw july 4th was not of this world.
content.summary: Witnessed a large solid red circle hovering over treeline for 25 minutes, then rise very high in the sky and come toward us and hover for several minutes then completely disappeared. there were no clouds in the sky.
My husband and i were sitting on porch and all of a sudden saw 2 red orbs in sky above trees

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch facing west towards the rampart range in colorado springs. there was a bright orb in the sky that just hung out for quite a while. there has never been this light there before. after 5-10 minutes i realized my i phone was in my pocket and decided to record the event. i held the phone stationary and recorded crazy movements from the glowing orb. it moved fast and unlike anything i have ever seen. very ironic due to the proximity of norad. who knows?
content.summary: Hovering light above tree line just 5 miles north of norad in colorado springs.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to put on the grill cover, i noticed a very bright light in the sky to the east. it was brighter than any star i've ever seen, but appeared stationary. i kept looking at it, since i view stars regularly with a telescope i did not recognize this object at all. it was so bright it had lines coming off of it like how stars are portrayed in paintings. i still can't believe how bright it was. it was just stationary so i assumed it was just a star, then it started moving slowly to the south. it moved in a straight line, i screamed for my husband to come look, and it started getting dimmer and dimmer until it disappeared within seconds. he never saw the object. ive never seen any celestial object or aeronautical craft do this. i am a firm believer that life exists elsewhere in the universe, but i also believe it is impossible that life could or would want to ever visit here. i feel absolutely crazy for reporting this object, but i absolutely saw what i saw.
content.summary: Bright light that looked like  star, got brighter and brighter, it was blinding to look at.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a student at loring job corps center in limestone, me during the event i eye-witnessed in 1998. i vividly remembered it was around 9:30 at a clear night while i was just walking around the basketball court behind the women's dorm. as i was walking around at basketball court i was just out looking at the clear night sky. soon i turned my attention as i started to glanced at a far distance as i saw three objects with blinking lights hovering on top of the pine trees. two out the three objects ascended up to the sky and disappeared. one of the three objects stayed and started to approach towards the basket court where i was and as i started walking back to the steps next to the ladies dormitory. i stayed on the flat form next to the other side of the step leading to the cafeteria. 
the object that i was looking at was approaching towards me and descended lower hovering no more than 10 feet over me. i felt scared and confused thinking that this can't be real. because i have never in my life had ever seen a ufo this close and personal. i can remember that it was shaped like an oval black craft. illuminated multicolored lights around underneath the craft. also with a colored sphere underneath its center. no sounds coming from the craft. i was just amazed that this kind of technology exist and wondering if there was those little green men inside looking at me was thinking about taking me with them or killing me as i was mesmerized by looking at this object flying very low over me. some other student saw this e this ufo and it ascended up in the sky and disappeared as everyone who saw this were amazed as i was. this was a once in a lifetime experience to eyewitness this event. to the day i die. i will never forget that night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufo over tree top 2 flew away and 1 ascend towards to the air base and slowly hover under me.

content.detailedDescription: I work the night shift and i get out around 11:30. i stopped by a wendys in peabody to get some dinner and as i headed towards home, i saw a green glowing orb in the sky. it seemed reasonably close...Possibly tree level. it was solid and no signs of movement. i wouldn't describe it as a craft upon first glance but the way it acted didn't seem as if it were naturally occuring. a few seconds after i saw it, the object seemed to have bolted full speed towards the sky. it was there one second and gone the next. i originally thought it could possibly be a meteorite or a shooting star as i have never had the pleasure to see any event in the sky before, however the more i thought about it, the more i thought had it been one of the two as an explanation, i would imagine the light would descend rather than ascend rapidly like it did.
content.summary: Glowing green orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside of work.  it was right at dark.  i n��ticed toward the east a bright round white light. it just appeared out of no where. it was a clear night.   it looked like it was coming toward my direction. then it stopped a few seconds then started moving slowly to it's left then to its right.  then it slowly decended. i lost track of it as it moved behind a building.  i felt it was odd. 

my photo and video was taken by my iphone. its not good quality.  definit��ley doesn't do it justice. 

i also am including a picture of a shot of the moon from the moon globe app that i found odd. it to me looks like a structure of some sort.  i would like your feed back on this.
content.summary: I was sitting outside of wok.  white light appeared from no where. clear skies. it looked like a  bright  ball of white light.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from dinner when i look up and see a ufo only a short distance above my car! it was triangular and dark dull exterior  with two lights flashing as it hovered by. i was so astonished i drove into the other lane. only second down the road did i see another one of these ufos heading in the same direction. this is one of the craziest things i have ever seen in my life.
content.summary: While driving a 2 ufos hovered over my car

content.detailedDescription: Well it all happened on june 10th or so 1990. we were celebrating my older brothers 8th grade graduation and my older sisters high school graduation as well.  my mom had invited a few friends and family over for a dinner she prepared for them. my friend and i were sitting outside on the front porch eating and he then asked if we had some lemon and i went inside to get a few pieces, as i was heading back out my friend came back in running and shouting that we need to go outside to see this thing that was up above our neighbors house. most of us ran out and shortly after everyone that was there eating inside were out in the front porch and yard in disbelief at what we were seing.   it was a pretty big circle like object that was hovering and turning in a circular motion clockwise at a very slow speed.  it looked like how they show in the tv and movies. i know it sounds so typical but i swear on everything that we all saw it very clear cause it was so low and the size of it let us get a super clean look at it. my mom and our neighbors parents saw it as well along with a bunch of my friends too. while it was turning it made this low humming whistling sound.  i can recreate the sound with my mouth and it sounds almost exactly the same way. after a few minutes it started moving east of us at a very slow speed the whole time turning and making that sound. my friends and i began following it and picking up rocks from a nearby field and tried hitting it. it went over the field and made its way across a lil canal so we couldn't continue to follow it. then what we all saw is something i'll never forget . it paused for a few seconds as if taking a few more looks and then kinda like beamed away in a flash. it wasn't like it took off fast and or dissappear but it went so fast that you could barely see how it left. till this day i wonder if anyone else has seen and described one like the one we saw that night.  also i wonder and think if they knew that at that time we didn't have any camera phones or camcorder to record them and that's why they got so close in plain sight. at first we thought it was some sort of government aircraft expirement or something.  but after we saw how it took off we were all in a major state of aw and confusion. we all still bring it up here and there but it's not till now that i've been really looking more at your show that i wanted to really share my story with others that are out there.  regardless if you guys choose to share it or not i feel better letting professionals like yourselves know about it rather than just a cool story at gatherings or when ufo talks come up. i honestly believe in ufos after that incident but i can definitely see how some people think that's totally crazy. it's crazy cause some people , even pprofessionals spend there whole life trying to spot a glimpse of a ufo and here we are from a very tiny small town called firebaugh in central california and came across a very, very , clear view of one !!  at that time we had a population. of around 6,000 people. lately i've been thinking of it alot and i'm getting more and more interested in knowing what it really was. i hope we soon find out more about these things very soon.
content.summary: While having dinner with friends and family we all saw this ufo at an incredible low view.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading outside to get something out of my car. i looked up and saw venus in the eastern sky. i was admiring venus when something lit up in the corner of my eye basically directly above me but in the upper southern sky. i looked straight at the light thinking it would be an airplane but then noticed the object was just sitting there not moving and making no noise and had a dimly flickering light on its under side. then suddenly the object completely lit up on it's underside. i could make out the object being in a rectangular shape with the sides of the longer edges hanging down and the bottoms of the edges that hung down were what lit up. it almost reminded me of when you'd walk into a class room and turn on the florescent lights and how they would flicker a bit before coming all the way on. the light was yellow and when it lit up very bright i could see up inside of the object and could make out the lines of the frame and the shape of the object. but i couldn't see any real details. it was not very far up there but also not right over me. it was fairly large and definitely looked like a manned aircraft.
 as fast as the object lit up, the light then turned off and i couldn't see anything after that, i kept my focus close around that spot in hopes of seeing it's darkened shape moving in which ever direction possible as well as listened for any noise yet i didn't hear or see anything. what i saw happened all in a matter of 5 seconds or so. i don't think the object meant to light up when it did. i asked on facebook the next day if anyone had seen what i had seen and none of the couple of people who live near by knew what i was talking about. the moment that i saw it and when the lights went out i felt very odd. i thought about it in the moment and for some reason it felt as if it were more of a military craft more so than an alien spaceship. but what giant military craft will just sit there not moving or making any noise? most people i have talked to about it since then just think i'm crazy because i have been reading a lot about ufos/conspiracy theories/aliens a lot around that time. but i know what i saw and it was not an airplane as airplanes are always flying over this area and never once have i ever seen anything just sitting there.
content.summary: I saw something that seemed like it was something i shouldn't have seen

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were heading down the interstate on i-91 in greenfield mass it was still daylight out ...Right at the exit 27.....And i looked up into the sky.. allmost directly south of my car ,about a half a mile away ..And about 600 feet up and going about 100 mph.. i saw something flying towards us..I stared at it looking for the wings, no wings, i looked for tail rotor for a chopper ,it did not have one ...Then wow i said to tammy look....She looked up to...I was at the ex...So i drove off the interstate to the first parking lot 1 min went by   it was gone..   i called the pd and the radio stations no luck..
content.summary: Flew over our heads while driving down the interstate.. in the daylight

content.detailedDescription: My teenaged son and i were loading my truck to go back east. the object suddenly appeared over us with a very intense light. we calmly finished loading the truck and then drove off the mesa and onto the road. the craft stayed right above us, even as we drove past the road to 29 palms marine base. we continued east on highway 62. when we got to the colorado river, the craft suddenly turned off the light and moved faster than anything i had ever seen. it gained altitude and "shot" off toward the e/ne. in 1980, you never saw another car on that road. now, you meet quite a few. at one point, we both had to urinate. i hate snakes and the desert is their hunting place at night. since i could see where i was stepping, i wasn't afraid. my son and i both thought the entire situation was strange but decided to keep quiet about it. i was raised on and around military bases and knew this was not a military plane. it was just a saucer type object and other than being curious about it, we didn't think much about it.
content.summary: Round with extremely bright light, hovering over us.

content.detailedDescription: This is different than other ufo stories but i don't know what else the entities/experience could be labeled other than ufos...This took place in the third week of june in 1976 in my home, i was 5 years old...4 of my cousins were spending the night,we were in bed, 3 of us laying down vertically at head of bed and 2 horizontally at the bottom...We 3 at head of bed noticed a small (1-2 feet in diameter) cluster of lights in the bedroom window, eventually the lights came thru the window and hovered over the head of the bed...We were curious but not frightened...But the lights descended and enveloped us 3 and began to bite and sting...We pulled the blankets/sheet over us but the lights/entities behaved as if no blanket was there, they passed right through and continued stinging us...The crying brought my mother in, she didn't see anything and neither did my 2 cousins at the bottom of the bed...My mother moved the 3 of us from head of bed into the living room to camp out on the floor because we were afraid the lights would come back, i don't remember where they went when my mom came in...After settling us she went back to bed, we were then inside a sphere made of silvery lines of longitude and latitude maybe 10 feet or so in diameter ( its hard to judge size, everything seems big when ur little)the globe/sphere rotated slowly, it was peaceful and soothing...Here's the part i debated about leaving out,the next day my mother was murdered by my stepdad,my 2 cousins who didn't see the lights were gone back home when this happened...I know about mass hysteria and realize a very long time has passed since this happened, but i still seek answers from time to time...My cousins remember this too ( the 2 at foot of bed were older, 9 and 11 i think)but the older says she remembers all the fuss because she was trying to sleep and we were 'flipping out'...Maybe there are other stories out there like mine but i've never found one ...
content.summary: Swarm of lights entered through a window, hovered awhile near ceiling, descended in a ball and stung us

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was in my tent when i heard a whirring sound getting closer. i jumped up and ran outside to see 3 strange looking objects slowing down to a hover approximately 800 ft. above. they hovered for about 15 minutes drifting slightly sideways and back again, and then flew away at approx. 200 mph.
they were bright lights in the sky and the sound they made i had never heard before. i felt more in awe than afraid but was afraid for they hovered overhead for so long..
..All 3 keeping the same distance from each other as they slowly maneuvered to lightly to the right and then back to the left a few times. then they moved back to words the west and flew away. slowly for an instant and then fast like 200mph.
i have seen 6 of these over the past 30 years while fishing and camping just west of cheyenne mountain. one of the other three i saw fly right up to that mountain and lights disappeared. i'm fairly certain they are being flown out of cheyennes mtn. the old ho
e of norad.
content.summary: I have spent months over past 30 years camping just west of cheyenne mtn. and have seen 6 ufo altogether 3 on this night.

content.detailedDescription: In 2010 i lived south of kansas city in the country. i worked in kc and drove a road known as holmes rd to get into the city. one morning, on my way to work, i noticed off to my left (west) an oval shaped silver object in the sky, roughly a mile or more away. i have driven this stretch of road my whole life and had never witnesses something in the sky over that area. i was able to observe the object for approximately a minute. i was able to see it long enough to figure out what it wasn't. it wasn't a plane because it was stationary and it wasn't a helicopter because i didn't see any blades and it wasn't shaped like a copter. it wasn't something on my windshield or a reflection. i was/am convinced it was a real object in the sky. as i was observing the object, i passed by a row of tall trees and when i was clear of them (maybe five seconds later) the object was gone. i'm not claiming that it was an alien craft but i couldn't relate it to anything i'd seen before. i do find it odd as to where it was and the time if day.  it would have been over or near a lot of residential housing.  also the time of day (approx 7:00 am) would lead me to believe that other people could have seen it but i've been through you data base and did not see any other reports. however, there may some activity around the area because i've heard two other stories about sightings.
content.summary: Ufo over southern kansas city?

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1.I was going to washroom at my balcony  tarrace.
2.Dark orange nd red light behind  the cloud.
3.I thought its a cracker then after wards an orange dark orange fire ball surrounded with orange-red plate.
4.It was moving towards east in a constant speed then a pause behind cloud but its aura like lights were visible then suddenly a bit slowly towards east then just  flashes towards east.
5.During  sight it feels like static vibrations all over inside my body. after its disappearence was not beleaving on what i had seen  and i didnt tel anybody tough they will think i am mad.
6.After it flashes object disappears towards right side.(east).

note.
it was visible by indirect looking, on focusing on that the view was becomming more and more blur.
content.summary: Cloudy night from my tarrace, feels like vibration inside the body, time 1.28a.M approx.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed sleeping beside my husband. two daughters asleep in their rooms. our family dog was in the house. the next morning and even now, 26 years later, i have a clear memory of that night. a bright light came into the bedroom window. 2 aliens placed me in a seat, like on a plane. they conveyed that i was safe and they were friendly. they were curious about humans and had me relax as they explored my memory of common events that humans experience.  there may have been some physical manipulation and samples taken, though no puncture woulds were noted. of note: an electrical substation is directly across a field from this home.  no one believed me and i could not find a source to report this to at the time.
content.summary: Taken from bed to "plane"

content.detailedDescription:
in mid october 1983 my wife and i had been hunting locally and had come home at dark. about 2a.M. i went outside to look at the stars. i was looking south and to the east in my peripheral vision i saw a flash. when i looked at the spot where i saw the flash there was a oval black shape.
i went in the house and got my wife. we went out and it was still there.
i got my binoculars (10x50) from our truck and got a really good look.
it was the bottom of a round solid object we were looking at. there were
lights around the periphery and they flashed in unison at about 1 to 2 second intervals. after a couple of hours of watching it we got tired of 
looking at it and went back inside. i called the sherrifs dept. told them what we saw and asked if we were the only ones to report it. the response was that there were many reports. that made us feel much better.
  now the story gets more interesting. the next night we watched for it again but no luck. but the third night it was back in exactly the same spot. for the next two to two and half weeks it was back every other or
every third night always in the same spot about one to two miles away,
it was quite large at least one hundred yards in diameter probobly
larger. the lights always flashed together and it was completly silent.
we never saw it come or go even though we watched it for hours. to this day it has never returned. we know our sighting was real because we were not the only people to see it, we could see the hull clearly with binoculars, and it blocked out many stars and we saw it on many nights.
we also called the planitarium and they also had many reports of people seeing it.
  even though this happened more than thirty years ago i am reporting the 
sighting because my report adds to the overall data base and it might cooberate someone else's report.
content.summary: Happened every other night or every third night for two to two and a half weeks always in same spot. lights on periphery flashed in unison. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was landing coming in to land at denver international on a flight from san diego. i believe that we were somewhere over the bailey, park county area over the mountains. i looked out the window, positioned behind the right wing of the plane. a few hundred feet from the plane at a slightly lower altitude was a reflective chrome-like triangular craft with a noticeable dome of the same color in the middle of the top of the craft. it was approximately 30 feet long if i had to guess. i knew immediately it was not a plane because there were no visible seams, it was just smooth with the only change being the dome bump. i stared at it for a few seconds as it stayed almost perfectly aligned with us. i turned to wake my mother up who was in the middle seat next to me so that she could look, when we turned back to look it was still there, but my mother couldn't see well (cataracts). i turned away one more time, turned back and it was gone. i tried to spot it ahead of or behind us but it had vanished.
content.summary: Was landing in denver, saw a metallic triangular craft flying in line with the plane out the right side.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay. my father is deceased, i am reporting for him. he was a united airlines pilot from 1958 to 1986. one day in the '80s my brother asked him, did he ever see a ufo. to our utter surprise, he said yes. 
  first of all you should know this man, capt. r.J.(skip) harrison, was at that time a co pilot. he flew without incident all those years,(except for a hijacking, but that's another story.)  before that, was an air force pilot as well. he was a pilot's pilot, a real safety nut, a go by the book person in all aspects of life. he was also very truthful, and demanded truth from us. this situation put him in a kind of a bind. 

 in the early eighties,while flying a domestic run across the united states in a 737, at night, at 35,000 feet, the crew observed what they supposed was another airplane flying nearby. they radioed ground control and asked, casually, "who is that flying at our 2 o'clock?"  ground said; "no one is flying at your 2 o'clock." crew replied, "well, we're staring right at it." 
ground again repeated there was no traffic in their area at that altitude and position. 

my father said ground asked them for identifying marks. what they replied was something like, "we see lights and a cigar shaped object." after more back and forth, ground asked that deadly question; "would you like to make a report."  off mike, the crew quickly discussed among themselves. by crew i mean the navigator, the captain, and my father, copilot. they replied that no, they would not like to make a report. that was the end of the discussion. the object flew alongside of them for another half hour, and then disappeared. 

as you know, the reason the crew would not make a report is that they would then have to take all their psychological tests over again, and have the incident written into their permanent record. it was a distinctly black mark to report such things and very much frowned upon.

my dad only discussed this with us once. he died in 1993. i am sure he would have liked to have added this to some database somewhere had he the chance. 

this is really as good as i can do. i can't remember the color of the lights, just that the thing was on my dad's side of the airplane and he was thoroughly exasperated by the fact that there was so little they could do about it.
content.summary: I am reporting for my father who was a united airlines pilot for 35 years. he and flight crew all saw the same thing. they communicated to ground about it, because it appeared so close to the plane they were flying at 35,000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: My younger brother, who is a graduate military electronics engineer, and i (a recently discharged us army officer), while fishing in our 18' anchored boat, approx. 19 miles off the coast of panama city beach, florida, saw two metallic craft approach from due west noiselessly at approx. 40-60mph and then hover over a us navy undersea warfare manned research platform (building on pilings and the base for which is in panama city beach on st. andrews bay) that we were approx. only 100' ft from (security then was evidently very lax).  as they were approaching from approx. 2-4 miles away, navy frogmen were descending stairs to enter a rubber raft, however, when the craft became very close to the platform, the frogmen rapidly climbed back up the stairs into the facility, plainly suggesting that they had seen the craft as well.  the two craft then hovered for 5-10 minutes at which time they were approx. 300 feet from our boat, and we could see the bottom half of the disc (elliptical shape from the side) was a purplish matte color on the bottom half (to the center horizontal parting line) and a silver matte color on the top half.  they had no markings, windows, seams and were the most perfectly constructed appearing objects i've ever seen in my life (i'm a master's graduate from a school of architecture).  they then moved in unison to the se for approximately one mile, stopped, came back in reverse and hovered over the platform/facility and to our astonishment, then ascended at a 45 degree angle evidently at the speed of bullets, becoming in approx. 2 seconds just dots that vanished.  simultaneously, at that precise moment, two us air force phantom jets from tyndall afb in panama city (we deduced that from the direction of their approach) flew at approx, 100 feet altitude over our boat and at the precise top of the platform then sharply ascended, turning on their very noticeable afterburners (from the mind-numbing sound and heat felt) at a 45 degree angle, clearly locked on and pursuing in the precise direction the vanishing ufo's.  if i had carried my recently purchased 35mm camera with 4x telephoto lens, i would have captured the clearest, most detailed photos of ufo's in world history with a us military facility in the foreground, since they were w/in 300' from us in very clear weather with cloudless blue skies.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two craft approx the length of 727's flew noiseless, vibrationless in unison to inspect a us navy undersea research manned platform

content.detailedDescription: On july 19, 2014 at 3am, subject was outside watching the sky, when he saw stars moving around in the sky. on further observation they were orbs and were yellow and darting around the bigger ship. the bigger ship was dark and didn't seem to have a shape, the smaller orbs were glowing orange and their reflection lite up the bigger shape, but it had no lights of its own. the smaller orbs seemed to be "leaking light" one of the orbs came within a 100 feet of the subject and hovered. subject complained of being dizzy while the orb was near him, but ok once it left.  subject watched for two hours until the larger shape and the orbs shot straight up into the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Subject was outside at 3am when he noticed some stars darting around in the night sky
